```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(lubridate)
datafest <- mini_clicks
```

```{r,message=FALSE}
datafest1 <- datafest %>%
  mutate(date_time = mdy_hms(date_time))
  select(date_time,
         user_location_country, 
         user_location_city, 
         orig_destination_distance,
         is_package, 
         srch_ci, 
         srch_co,
         is_booking)
 filter(is_booking=='1') 
```
